column3: Could we change the instructions to never fail?
Ta, my bad. Although I guess the 32 bit install will have the same problem so maybe add it here as well?

That would be repeating the same thing twice, maybe it would be better to add a *warning* section describing the problem and solution, instead of buried in the instructions to type? (and possibly refer to that here)
Great, ill do that later, there are a few more things I need to add
